summary: This is a prison administrative document dated July 30, 2019, regarding inmate Jeffrey Epstein. It states that Epstein is being taken off Psych Observation and needs to be housed with an appropriate cellmate. The document also includes a later email chain from August 14, 2019, showing a list of recipients and their read/response status.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate identified as 476318-054 who is being taken off Psych Observation and needs to be housed with an appropriate cellmate.

events.title: Epstein taken off Psych Observation
events.description: Prison administrative document records that inmate Jeffrey Epstein is being taken off Psych Observation and needs to be housed with an appropriate cellmate.

events.title: Email chain regarding document
events.description: Email chain shows a list of 71 recipients with their read/response status regarding a document, with 27 acknowledged and 44 pending.

keyFacts: On July 30, 2019, Jeffrey Epstein was taken off Psych Observation in prison.
The document indicates Epstein needed to be housed with an appropriate cellmate after being removed from Psych Observation.
An email chain from August 14, 2019, shows this document was distributed to 71 recipients with varying response statuses.
This administrative record was created just weeks before Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
